name: OpenUserLab
description: Full-stack HCI/HAI experiment management platform using Next.js, React, TypeScript, PostgreSQL and Prisma, with features for study creation, participant recruitment, and progress tracking.

name: Attimo Pizzeria
description: RWD dynamic ordering website featuring order customization. Built with React, Redux, and Ant Design.

name: Nouvel Hotel
description: RWD static hotel website with pages for the homepage, Rooms & Suites, and Contact, optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop.

name: RAINBOWL
description: Gamification Diet Tracking App developed with SwiftUI and Firebase, featuring dynamic visuals based on dietary records.

name: MINE DETECTOR
description: Movie review app featuring movie info, user login, ratings, comments, and a watchlist. Built with React Native, Redux, Firebase, and NativeBase.

name: BobaHONG
description: A Unity 2D platform game where players control a boba escaping from a witch's straw. Collect three materials in each level to brew the final potion and transform the boba back into a human.

name: Underwater Band
description: An AR laundromat experience where customers act as talent scouts, inviting sea creatures from washing machines to perform in a shared band.
